about_the_game:
Step into the thrilling Striker Zone – a cross-platform shooter game where heroism meets the heat of battle. Engage in heart-pounding warfare with soldiers from around the globe, each moment packed with adrenaline and the echo of gunfire.

In Striker Zone, you are more than a soldier; you're a modern warrior, a hero poised to strike in the zone where war never ends. Your arsenal? A range of free, state-of-the-art weapons at your fingertips. Every battle is a chance to rewrite history in this world of constant war, where your army comrades become your brethren in arms.

Battlefields come to life with the sound of shooting and the rush of survival instincts. Attack is more than a strategy; it's your second nature, honed to perfection in the zone where only the strongest persist. And as the gun smoke clears, will you stand as the ultimate survivor?

The game's essence is warfare, but the experience is pure adrenaline. Striker Zone offers a free PvP environment that challenges your shooter instincts at every turn. Each battle, each skirmish, each silent takedown could tip the scales in this relentless world war.

With every fight, you climb the ranks of the army elite, proving your mettle as a soldier, hero, and legend of the Striker Zone. Your weapon is not just a gun; it's an extension of your will, modern machinery of warfare that brings the concept of attack to a whole new level.

So, prepare to immerse yourself in Striker Zone, where the action never stops and the next battle is just a heartbeat away. Will you answer the call of duty and become the hero this world needs?

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content that is not appropriate for all ages or for viewing at work: Violence or abuse, adult content!

Step into the thrilling Striker Zone – a cross-platform shooter game where heroism meets the heat of battle. Engage in heart-pounding warfare with soldiers from around the globe, each moment packed with adrenaline and the echo of gunfire.

In Striker Zone, you are more than a soldier; you're a modern warrior, a hero poised to strike in the zone where war never ends. Your arsenal? A range of free, state-of-the-art weapons at your fingertips. Every battle is a chance to rewrite history in this world of constant war, where your army comrades become your brethren in arms.

Battlefields come to life with the sound of shooting and the rush of survival instincts. Attack is more than a strategy; it's your second nature, honed to perfection in the zone where only the strongest persist. And as the gun smoke clears, will you stand as the ultimate survivor?

The game's essence is warfare, but the experience is pure adrenaline. Striker Zone offers a free PvP environment that challenges your shooter instincts at every turn. Each battle, each skirmish, each silent takedown could tip the scales in this relentless world war.

With every fight, you climb the ranks of the army elite, proving your mettle as a soldier, hero, and legend of the Striker Zone. Your weapon is not just a gun; it's an extension of your will, modern machinery of warfare that brings the concept of attack to a whole new level.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Steam OS, Linux Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Quad core CPU 3.3 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 630 or similar (2GB VRAM)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Additional Notes: recent binary ATI or NVidia drivers (MESA may not work reliably)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9 (Mavericks)
  • Processor: Quad core CPU 3.3 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 630 or similar (2GB VRAM)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Striker Zone: Gun Games Online

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™2 Quad Q6600 & AMD Athlon II X4 640 AM3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or AMD Radeon RX 460 or Intel HD 630 (2GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Join in with friends in a online shooter about modern warfare!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Russian*, Simplified Chinese, Vietnamese
*languages with full audio support
